title: WHAT IS THE PURPOSE OF MAGNETIC PASSES / Q&A WITH DR. MARCO PARET
description:
Magnetic passes are a non-verbal hypnosis technique, where the hands are doing movements very close to the subject's body, without touching it. Dr. Marco Paret is the best teacher and the world-leading authority in the field of non-verbal hypnosis, so in this video, he will answer your questions about this powerful technique Magnetic Passes and we will see demonstrations. Watch the whole video to learn these specific secrets. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
